column1: Taur-e-Ndaedelos was another name of Mirkwood
column2: after the Necromancer emerged at Dol Guldur.

column1: The name is Sindarin and means "forest of the great fear". taur means "forest"
column2: entry TAWAR + en "of the" + daedelos "shadow of fear".
the latter word was given the form Daedhelos (with lenition -delos) and glossed as "Shadow of Abomination".

column1: In The Book of Lost Tales
column4: referring to a land of Tol Eressea known as Heath of the Sky-roof. It was the site of a great battle
column5: and afterwards was known as Withered Heath.
